titles.title: My Goal Is God Himself (familiar easy great)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My goal is God Himself not joy nor peace Nor even blessing but Himself my God Tis His to lead me there - nor mine - but His At any cost dear Lord by any road{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So faith bounds forward to its goal in God And love can trust her Lord to lead her there Upheld by Him my soul is following hard Till God hath full fulfilled my deepest prayer{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No matter if the way be sometimes dark No matter if the cost be oft-times great He knoweth how I best shall reach the mark The way that leads to Him must needs be straight{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}One thing I know I cannot say Him nay One thing I do I press towards my Lord My God my glory here, from day to day And in the glory there my great reward{/lang-eng}
